page.title: 06SOCIETIES WITHIN HARTPURY
page.content: {Women's Institute}(est. 1919) meets monthly on 2nd Thursday evening for home craft demonstrations with 35 members, also having a longstanding association with Hartpury Ward at Over Hospital.{Wives'Fellowship}(est.1957) meets monthly on 3rd Wednesday evening with 23 members for talks and outings. {Playgroup}meets on Tuesday and Thursday mornings.{Drama Club}perform Music Hall Concerts, Plays, and Pantomines for charity.{Over 60's Club (est.1962 by Miss. Chapman - present leader) meets fortnightly on Wednesday mornings with 70 members from Parish and neighbouring villages.{ {Hartpury United Charities}administered by Trustess help people 'in need' and Mr.A.Finch is voluntary village welfare officer.{Table Tennis Club } has 3 teams in the Gloucester League.
